page.title: List of St. George Illawarra Dragons representatives

revisions.rev:
Including players from the [[St. George Illawarra Dragons]] that have represented while at the club and the years they achieved their honours, if known. Representatives from the [[Shellharbour City Dragons]] are included as they are a feeder club. ==International== ===Australia=== *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Shaun Timmins]] (1999-00, 2002â04) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Trent Barrett]] (2000â02, 2005) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Nathan Blacklock]] (2001) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Mark Gasnier]] (2001, 2005â08) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Jason Ryles]] (2001â02, 2004â05) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Luke Bailey (rugby league)|Luke Bailey]] (2003â04) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Matt Cooper (rugby league)|Matt Cooper]] (2004â06) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Ben Creagh]] (2005,2011) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Ben Hornby]] (2006) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Darius Boyd]] (2009) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Brett Morris]] (2009â10) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Michael Weyman]] (2010) *{{flagicon|AUS}} [[Dean Young (rugby league)|Dean Young]] (2010)
